title: Wielka woda
overview: Set during the flood of the millennium which hit Wroc≈Çaw and its surroundings in 1997. When a flood wave approaches the capital of Lower Silesia, a decision is made - in order to save the city from the destructive element, the surrounding villages and fields have to be sacrificed. How will one decision affect the life of an entire community? The three main characters, faced with an extreme situation, will face events which will result in enormous destruction and the death of innocent people.
